cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuroi

sentence.kanji: 彼女は黒いドレスを着ています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kuroi doresu wo kite imasu
sentence.english: She's wearing a black dress.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mamoru

sentence.kanji: 彼は約束を守る人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha yakusoku wo mamoru hito desu
sentence.english: He's one to keep his promises.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yasupoi

sentence.kanji: そのシャツは安っぽいね。
sentence.romaji: sono shatsu ha yasupoi ne
sentence.english: That shirt looks cheap.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuroji

sentence.kanji: わが社は今年度、黒字となりました。
sentence.romaji: wagasha ha konnendo kuroji to narimashita
sentence.english: Our company got into the black this year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tairyou

sentence.kanji: 昨日大量のゴミが出たの。
sentence.romaji: kinou tairyou no gomi ga deta no
sentence.english: A large amount of garbage was put out yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katsuji

sentence.kanji: 新聞の活字が読みやすくなったね。
sentence.romaji: shinbun no katsuji ga yomi yasuku nata ne
sentence.english: The newspaper typeface became easier to read.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryou

sentence.kanji: 最近、食事の量を減らしています。
sentence.romaji: saikin shokuji no ryou wo herashite imasu
sentence.english: Lately, I'm cutting down how much food I eat.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mukai

sentence.kanji: 向かいの席が空いていますよ。
sentence.romaji: mukai no seki ga aite imasu yo
sentence.english: The seat opposite is vacant.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's douitsu

sentence.kanji: この人とその人は、同一人物ですか。
sentence.romaji: kono hito to sono hito ha douitsu jinbutsu desu ka
sentence.english: Are this person and that person the same?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's douji

sentence.kanji: 二人の走者は同時にゴールしたよ。
sentence.romaji: futari no sousha ha douji ni go-ru shita yo
sentence.english: The two runners reached the goal at the same time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ichidou

sentence.kanji: 一同顔を見合わせました。
sentence.romaji: ichidou kao wo miawasemashita
sentence.english: We all looked at each other.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tomu

sentence.kanji: 彼の人生は変化に富んでいるな。
sentence.romaji: kare no jinsei ha henka ni tonde iru na
sentence.english: He has a wealth of life-changing experiences.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koujou

sentence.kanji: 全員で技術の向上に努めています。
sentence.romaji: zenin de gijutsu no koujou ni tsutomete imasu
sentence.english: We all work together to improve our skills.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mimamoru

sentence.kanji: 皆で暖かく見守りましょう。
sentence.romaji: minna de atatakaku mimamorimashou
sentence.english: I hope all of us will kindly watch over them.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanryou

sentence.kanji: 仕事は全て完了しました。
sentence.romaji: shigoto ha subete kanryou shimashita
sentence.english: I completed all the work.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mukeru

sentence.kanji: 彼は上司に怒りの目を向けたんだよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha joushi ni ikari no me wo muketa n da yo
sentence.english: He looked angrily at his boss.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ikouni

sentence.kanji: 彼は一向に興味を示さないの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ikouni kyoumi wo shimesanai no
sentence.english: He doesn't show any interest at all.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taryou

sentence.kanji: その事故で多量のガス漏れがあったね。
sentence.romaji: sono jiko de taryou no gasumore ga ata ne
sentence.english: A large amount of gas leaked because of the accident.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shouryou

sentence.kanji: 私はコーヒー豆を小量で買うようにしています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha ko-hi- mame wo shouryou de kauyou ni shiteimasu 。
sentence.english: I try to buy coffee beans in small amounts.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hakaru

sentence.kanji: はかりで小麦粉の分量を量ったよ。
sentence.romaji: hakari de komugiko no bunryou wo hakata yo
sentence.english: I measured how much flour there was with a kitchen scale.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yoseru

sentence.kanji: 車を塀に寄せたよ。
sentence.romaji: kuruma wo hei ni yoseta yo
sentence.english: I pulled the car over by the wall.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shouryou

sentence.kanji: 泡立てたクリームに少量のブランデーを加えます。
sentence.romaji: awadateta kuri-mu ni shouryou no burande- wo kuwaemasu
sentence.english: A small amount of brandy is added to the whipped cream.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's doufuu

sentence.kanji: 手紙に写真が同封されていたよ。
sentence.romaji: tegami ni shashin ga doufuu sarete ita yo
sentence.english: A photograph was enclosed with the letter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's furusato

sentence.kanji: いつも古里を懐かしく思い出すの。
sentence.romaji: itsumo furusato wo natsukashiku omoidasu no
sentence.english: I always remember my hometown fondly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's umeru

sentence.kanji: 庭に穴を掘ってそれを埋めました。
sentence.romaji: niwa ni ana wo hote sore wo umemashita
sentence.english: I dug a hole in the backyard and buried it in there.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uzumeru

sentence.kanji: パレードと観衆が道を埋めていたよ。
sentence.romaji: pare-do to kanshuu ga michi wo uzumete ita yo
sentence.english: The parade and the spectators filled the road.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sumi

sentence.kanji: 服に墨がついちゃった。
sentence.romaji: fuku ni sumi ga tsuichata
sentence.english: The black ink has stained the clothes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yoru

sentence.kanji: 帰りに叔母の家に寄ります。
sentence.romaji: kaeri ni oba no ie ni yorimasu
sentence.english: I dropped in at my aunt's house on the way home.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's muki

sentence.kanji: 花瓶の向きを変えたの。
sentence.romaji: kabin no muki wo kaeta no
sentence.english: I changed the way the vase was facing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mada

sentence.kanji: 宿題は未だ終わっていません。
sentence.romaji: shukudai ha mada owate imasen
sentence.english: I haven't finished my homework yet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's imouto

sentence.kanji: 私の妹は小学生です。
sentence.romaji: watashi no imouto ha shougakusei desu
sentence.english: My little sister goes to elementary school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wakai

sentence.kanji: 彼はまだ若いです。
sentence.romaji: kare ha mada wakai desu
sentence.english: He's still young.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hon

sentence.kanji: 本を１冊買いました。
sentence.romaji: hon wo isatsu kaimashita
sentence.english: I bought one book.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hayashi

sentence.kanji: 私たちは林の中に入っていった。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha hayashi no naka ni haite ita
sentence.english: We entered the woods.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mori

sentence.kanji: 私は森を歩くのが好きです。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha mori wo aruku no ga suki desu
sentence.english: I like to walk in the forest.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kabu

sentence.kanji: 最近株を始めました。
sentence.romaji: saikin kabu wo hajimemashita
sentence.english: I recently started investing in stocks.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shushou

sentence.kanji: 今の首相はあまり力がない。
sentence.romaji: ima no shushou ha amari chikara ga nai
sentence.english: The current Prime Minister doesn't have much power.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kurushii

sentence.kanji: 食べ過ぎておなかが苦しい。
sentence.romaji: tabesugite onaka ga kurushii
sentence.english: I have eaten too much and my stomach hurts.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nigai

sentence.kanji: 私は苦いコーヒーが好きです。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha nigai ko-hi- ga suki desu
sentence.english: I like bitter coffee.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's usui

sentence.kanji: この電子辞書はとても薄い。
sentence.romaji: kono denshi jisho ha totemo usui
sentence.english: This electronic dictionary is very thin.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aji

sentence.kanji: この料理は味が薄い。
sentence.romaji: kono ryouri ha aji ga usui
sentence.english: This food is tasteless.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ueru

sentence.kanji: 庭にバラを植えました。
sentence.romaji: niwa ni bara wo uemashita
sentence.english: I planted a rose in the garden.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kusa

sentence.kanji: 庭に草が生えている。
sentence.romaji: niwa ni kusa ga haete iru
sentence.english: Weeds are growing in the garden.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ha

sentence.kanji: これは桜の葉です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha sakura no ha desu
sentence.english: This is a cherry tree leaf.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ki

sentence.kanji: 台風で木が倒れた。
sentence.romaji: taifuu de ki ga taoreta
sentence.english: The tree fell because of the typhoon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukue

sentence.kanji: 新しい机を買ってもらいました。
sentence.romaji: atarashii tsukue wo kate moraimashita
sentence.english: They bought me a new desk.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tana

sentence.kanji: 大きな棚はとても便利です。
sentence.romaji: ooki na tana ha totemo benri desu
sentence.english: A large set of shelves is very useful.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hondana

sentence.kanji: これはとても大きな本棚ですね。
sentence.romaji: kore ha totemo ooki na hondana desu ne
sentence.english: This is a very big bookcase.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's honjitsu

sentence.kanji: 本日のランチはハンバーグでございます。
sentence.romaji: honjitsu no ranchi ha hanba-gu de gozaimasu
sentence.english: The lunch of the day is hamburger steak.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mihon

sentence.kanji: 見本はこちらにございます。
sentence.romaji: mihon ha kochira ni gozaimasu
sentence.english: There's a sample here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's matsu

sentence.kanji: 今月末にカナダに行きます。
sentence.romaji: kongetsu matsu ni kanada ni ikimasu
sentence.english: I will go to Canada at the end of this month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's getsumatsu

sentence.kanji: 月末までに申込書を送ってください。
sentence.romaji: getsumatsu made ni moushikomisho wo okute kudasai
sentence.english: Please send the application form by the end of the month.
